name: places/ChIJrS4aCf5YwokRvonNxpGqFpI
formattedAddress: 15 W 54th St 3rd floor, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 15 W 54th St 3rd floor, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
I purchased my first luxury watch in December 2021 which came on a stainless steel bracelet. I wanted to make it extra special by purchasing a custom rubber strap. The Grand Seiko Boutique I bought the watch from recommended Jean Rousseau. I made an appointment and met with Shayna Warren-Freeman, the Boutique Director.

Shayna was extremely friendly, knowledgeable, and patient. She showed me different color and thread swatches and recommended what strap/stich color would best complement my timepiece. I ended up ordering a blue rubber strap with gold stitching to match the blue dial and gold second hand on my watch.

The strap was supposed to be made in Paris and be completed in 4-6 weeks. Due to global supply chain constraints and backlogs at US Customs, I did not have the strap after 3 months! Shayna wanted to make things right and invited me back to the store to look at a similar gold thread that could be made in-house at the New York boutique (the original gold thread I selected is very thin and delicate. Only the craftsmen and women in France are trained to work with it). I liked the gold thread alternative and once I selected it, Shayna had her team produce the strap in only 2-3 days!

I originally ordered my strap with a single-folding deployant clasp. It felt too bulky underneath the strap so Shayna was able to swap it for a standard pin buckle. The finished product looked absolutely amazing!

I would strongly recommend Jean Rousseau for any watch enthusiast looking for a special strap to change the look of their timepiece. The boutique also offers a nice selection of standard lug width calfskin leather, rubber, and exotic leather skin strap options for those who want something right away without waiting for a custom strap.

I am grateful for Shayna's help and guidance. She was courteous, professional, and kept me up-to-date throughout the process. You will not be disappointed working with her!

originalText.text:
I originally made the mistake of walking in without an appointment for a custom order and felt like the staff was a bit cold with me. I will admit that I walked out feeling a bit disappointed bit from the experience, especially after spending money on a premium product.

Fast-forward to my second visit after I was made aware my order was ready, I had an appointment this time and the experience was night and day. Second time around, the staff was expecting me, super helpful, friendly and extremely willing to show me various options when I decided to get an additional off-the-shelf strap to go on a different watch.

Their materials are beautiful and quality of their work honestly exceeded my expectations.

Moral of the story... plan your visit via appointment  and you're guaranteed a great experience.

originalText.text: I was referred here for a band by a colleague who worked in the luxury watch industry, and had very high expectations. My made to order band is beautiful, however, it came off the first time I wore it, though fortunately I noticed. When I returned, they were not apologetic for almost making me lose a financially and sentimentally valuable piece, though they did replace the spring bar, which came out again a few hours later. I then went to a separate watch repair store, which immediately identified that the bar should have been curved to accommodate the watch’s shape (based on the now scuffed leather of the band) and that with a vintage piece the holes for the spring bar may have been degraded. I will not be returning due to the overall mediocre service.

originalText.text:
Spectacular watch straps! Custom made from a variety of materials ranging from
Alligator to ostrich to salmon to stingray. Michael is extremely helpful and goes above and beyond at every step. Shayna the manager is an absolute pleasure!

originalText.text: Louis was a consummate professional, helped me sift through all the custom options for my new watch, and even helped me find a nice calf strap in gray in the meantime.
